Patients stimulate short GnRH-antagonist protocol . All woman measurement serum FSH estradiol ( E2 ) pelvic sonogram second day cycle . Ovarian stimulation initiate gonadotropin either form combination highly purified urinary FSH LH combination Rec FSH Rec LH . The dose gonadotropin depend level estradiol FSH prior stimulation . All patient re-evaluated day 3 5 stimulation ( measurment AMH , E2 pelvic sonogram ) , dosage adjustment make antagonist ( Cetrorelix ganirelix 0.25 mg/day ) initiate day 5 . Measurment AMH , E2 pelvic sonogram conferm size follicle continue every second day untill oocyte retrieval . When least 2 follicle reach average diameter 17 mm , final oocyte maturation trigger 10,000IU hCG ( Pregnyl , Organon , Greece Inc. ) . Oocyte retrieval perform 34 36 hour later . Patients successful fertilization embryo transfer sonographic guidance day 3 retrieval .
